title: The truth about the US President Trump’s India-US jersey | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of the US President Trump holding a T-shirt is being shared online. The text on the T-shirt read, ” India and America needs Jesus amen.”

ALSO READ: No, these girls aren’t Javed Akhtar’s daughters; here’s the fact check

NewsMobile fact-checked the picture and found it to be fake.

On putting the image through a Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture of the US President Donald Trump in which he is actually holding a football jersey of England.

An article dated July 12th, 2018, by ‘The Sun’, featured the original picture.

The picture was taken at the US Embassy in Brussels during an interview ahead of the Nato summit.

In the above real vs fake collage, it is clear that on the original has been manipulated using photo editing software.

This proves that the viral image is fake.
